GSD.description:
ALSA: hda: intel-sdw-acpi: harden detection of controller

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.13 by commit cce476954401e3421afafb25bbaa926050688b1d. For more details please see the references link.
